item.title: How I Pass The Azure DP-100 Exam
item.description: Like many people, I kicked off this year with a long list of resolutions. My list covers many items such as getting my fitness to the next level, but thatâ€™s a story for another time. One of my top three goals, and the one has come up regularly over the last couple of years, was to make an active effort to learn cloud computing. Luckily, my current employer has chosen Microsoft Azure as their cloud platform, hence allowing me to focus on it.
